description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Poor billy is hanging for his life. Save Billy from a gruesome death upon the gallows. Strap on a bow and arrow and cut Billy down. Better have a good aim, Billy only has so much air. Test your skills in 40 unique levels.
description.short: Poor billy is hanging for his life. Save Billy from a gruesome death upon the gallows. Strap on a bow and arrow and cut Billy down. Better have a good aim, Billy only has so much air. Test your skills in 40 unique levels.
